servinfo.title: DTC B1021: Air Bag Module Deployed

servinfosub.title: DTC Will Set when
servinfosub.ptxt: The SDM detects a crash of sufficient force to warrant activation of the air bag system. (SDM outputs a deployment command.)

ptxt.emph: Step 1: Check that DTC B1021 has been set although air bag has not been deployed.
Step 2: Check that DTC has been set due to failure of SDM.

attention3.ptxt: Before executing items in this flow, be sure to perform Air Bag Diagnostic System Check .

action.ptxt: Replace components and perform inspections as directed in Repair and Inspection Required after Accident .

test1.ptxt: Inspect front of vehicle and undercarriage for signs of impact.

action.ptxt: Replace components and perform inspections as directed in Repair and Inspection Required after Accident .
Substitute a known-good SDM and recheck.

attention3.ptxt: Upon completion of inspection and repair work, perform the following items.

item.ptxt: Reconnect all air bag system components and ensure all components are properly mounted.
Repeat Air Bag Diagnostic System Check to confirm that the trouble has been corrected.
Clear DTCs of BCM referring to DTC Clearance
